title: The government has a new plan to speed up big infrastructure projects - here's what's in it
description: The government wants to see a ‘cultural shift’ in the delivery of infrastructure.
content:
THE DEPARTMENT OF Public Expenditure is publishing a new plan this morning that it says will speed up the delivery of infrastructure projects. 
The Accelerating Infrastructure Action Plan will cap l… [+4799 chars]
